Keywords: Deity , Eternal , Past , Spy
Real Name: Druig
Special Powers
LEGEND OF THE PAST: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Druig this turn.
INFLUENCE: Mind Control. When Druig uses it, after resolutions choose one to last until your next turn: all hit characters gain Immobile; -or- all hit characters can't attack.
IGNITE: POWER: Make a range attack. Instead of normal damage, deal 1 penetrating damage to each hit character and all other characters within 3 squares of one or more hit characters.

I really like that influence power, too bad its only on last couple clicks. Ignite is pretty good too but be mindful it can hit your own guys. It also only needs to hit its target to do the 1 pen to everyone around them so thats can be pretty useful getting through some others high def values.
